Sentencas: Electrolyte-free fuel cell (EFFC), which contains only a single layer of the composition of ionic conductor and electronic conductor, has been reported to accomplish the function of a traditional three-layer solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Study on the key materials for realizing electrolyte-free fuel cell and semiconductor-ionic membrane fuel cell

Sentencas: It is interesting that the electronic conductors used in the reported EFFCs usually contain elements like Li and Na.
Titulo: Study on the key materials for realizing electrolyte-free fuel cell and semiconductor-ionic membrane fuel cell

Sentencas: In this study, we try to find out the key issues of realizing EFFC and uncover its working mechanism.
Titulo: Study on the key materials for realizing electrolyte-free fuel cell and semiconductor-ionic membrane fuel cell

Sentencas: Based on a typical EFFC that is made with ionic conductor Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 (SDC) and electronic conductor Ni0.8Co0.15Al0.05LiO2-& delta; (NCAL), different types of EFFCs are constructed using SDC and the online decomposition products of NCAL during fuel cell operation.
Titulo: Study on the key materials for realizing electrolyte-free fuel cell and semiconductor-ionic membrane fuel cell

Sentencas: The key components for realizing the function of EFFC as well as the influence of these components on cell performance is studied.
Titulo: Study on the key materials for realizing electrolyte-free fuel cell and semiconductor-ionic membrane fuel cell

Sentencas: By applying semiconductor-ionic conductor (SIC) composite on both sides of the EFFCs for the purpose of improving the catalytic activ-ity, semiconductor-ionic membrane fuel cell (SIMFC) is obtained, which exhibited enhanced performance.
Titulo: Study on the key materials for realizing electrolyte-free fuel cell and semiconductor-ionic membrane fuel cell

Sentencas: The critical issues for optimizing the power output and durability of EFFC and SIMFC are investigated.
Titulo: Study on the key materials for realizing electrolyte-free fuel cell and semiconductor-ionic membrane fuel cell

Sentencas: This work helps to understand the working mechanism of EFFC and SIMFC, and also provides insights into the optimization of these low-temperature fuel cells.
Titulo: Study on the key materials for realizing electrolyte-free fuel cell and semiconductor-ionic membrane fuel cell
